contentrichtext.text: The '''Universidade Federal de Rondônia''' ('''UNIR''', in English ''Federal University of Rondônia'') is located in the state of [[Rondônia]], in [[Brazil]]. It is the only public [[university]] in Rondônia. == External links == * [http://www.unir.br/ Official website] {{Brazilian universities}} {{Education in South America}} {{coord missing|Brazil}} [[Category:Universities in Brazil|Rondônia, Federal]] [[Category:Education in Rondônia]] [[Category:Educational institutions established in 1974]] {{Brazil-university-stub}}
